fileheader.filedesc: Functions for working with internal storage areas.

function.name: StorageAreas
function.explain: Get an array of "Storage area objects", with "count" member, and [] operator. (more info TBD)

function.name: FindStorageArea
function.explain: Gets a reference to the storage area named "areaname"
function.error: none (returns 0 on invalid parameter or area not found)

function.name: FindRootItemInStorageArea
function.explain: Finds the root item named "itemname" in the storage area named "area".

function.name: CreateStorageArea
function.explain: Create a new storage area with name "areaname".

function.name: CreateRootItemInStorageArea

parameter.name: objtype
parameter.value: Integer objtype, OR String ObjtypeName, OR GetItemDescriptor struct.

function.explain: Creates the "root" (top-level) item in the storage area "area". "itemname" is the name of this item, and "objtype" is its type.
Notes: The item is normally a container. For example, a bankbox is a storage area and the root item is the chest container. Normal items are then placed in this container.

function.name: DestroyRootItemInStorageArea
function.explain: Destroys the root item named "itemname" in storage area "area"
